div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1560 Ghonsle, c. 15 km. E of Baniyas (anc. Balanaea), Seleucis, 1955? Burial: c. 150 B.C. (Seyrig) Contents: 32 AR Cyme: 4 tetradr. Myrina: 7 tetradr. Aegae, Heracleia Ioniae, Magnesia Ioniae: 13 tetradr. Smyrna: 3 tetradr. Demetrius I: 1 tetradr. (Antiocheia); 2 dr. (Antiocheia) Alexander I Bala: 1 tetradr. (Antiocheia); 1 dr. (Antiocheia) Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, Tr√©sors du Levant (in press). It may be that this lot was part of the Akkar hd., no. 1559 above
